_header: Jesu for Thy clemency of Thy incarnation
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: A prayer to Jesus — one quatrain

BodArchGg39.Transcription:
Jesu for thy clemiens of thy incarnacyonand thy wowndes that thow
                    soferdyst for sowys redemsyo[n]that Jesu graunt and of my desessesand
                    Jesu of thy grace in hevyn to hand a ysh[ ]
BodArchGg39.Note:
Added to original blank page at end of printed book; stained at
                    edge.
